file.title: Put in quotes

p.text: command enters the text referred to it in quotation marks. Also, if the text already there is a double quote ( "), it is converted into two double quotes (" -!> ""). For example, the text Hello "Friend" after the work of this command will become "Hello," "Friend """.

file.seealso:
Quotes remove
